Dating: CHRISTIAN PERIOD (not before); CHRISTIAN PERIOD; ISLAMIC PERIOD (not after)
Technique: FORMED ON THE POTTER'S WHEEL; ENGOBE
Name: Vase
Description: Small globular vase with rounded flared rim, short neck with concave walls and stable base with flat bottom. Paste of an orangey colour and surface with pink-coloured coating, with ribs on the outside. The piece is burnt and partially degradated.
